course_title: Writing of Drama for the Stage II - DRAM FOR STAGE 2

sections.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. This particular course will run as a text-based asynchronous workshop on Canvas Wednesday-Thursday, with a synchronous play reading component on Collaborate Ultra. Play readings will be recorded for students who cannot attend in real time.

description: An advanced workshop class in writing drama for the stage. Studio work is required. Assumes a greater level of experience in writing drama for the stage than CRWR 407.
